entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Roman: budget weight loss
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫3,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

Application Description

Ready to kickstart your journey to a healthier you on a budget? Look no further than the Roman app ‚Äì your ultimate companion for achieving effective weight loss, shedding those extra pounds, and transforming your health without breaking the bank on expensive foods. Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Personalized Meal Plans: Access a diet calculator designed to meet your specific calorie and meal needs while keeping your budget in check. Input your current weight, and you'll receive a detailed meal plan tailored to your budget-friendly weight loss, calorie goals, and fat burning objectives. ‚Ä¢ Budget-Savvy Healthy Living: Embrace a healthier lifestyle with tips on nutrition, meal prep, and calorie-conscious choices that won't strain your wallet. Learn how to make every calorie count toward your health, budget weight loss goals, and fat burning efforts, all while enjoying affordable and nutritious food options. ‚Ä¢ Progress Tracking: Monitor your budget weight loss journey with built-in tracking features. Keep an eye on your calorie-conscious meal plans, nutrition intake, and your progress towards achieving your ideal weight, all while maximizing fat burning, on a budget. ‚Ä¢ Setting and Achieving Goals: Set realistic health and budget-friendly weight loss goals and use the app to track your progress. Stay motivated and accountable on your transformation journey, guided by expert nutritional advice and personalized tips for effective fat burning. ‚Ä¢ Budget-Friendly Meal Plans: Optimize your meal plans for cost-effective weight loss, ensuring you're on the right path to achieving your goals without overspending on food. Receive nutritional guidance that makes it easier to maintain a balanced diet while staying within your budget and supporting fat burning. ‚Ä¢ Calorie Tracking on a Budget: Keep a close eye on your daily calorie intake and expenditure while staying within your budgetary constraints. Achieve your weight loss and budget health goals without breaking the bank, thanks to our expert nutritional advice, progress monitoring tools, and fat burning insights. ‚Ä¢ Wellness and Transformation: Prioritize your wellness journey with our affordable and personalized approach to nutrition and health. Experience a transformation in your overall well-being while staying on budget, supported by effective fat burning strategies. The Roman app is your go-to solution for achieving a healthier, budget-conscious lifestyle. Say goodbye to costly diets and embrace a budget-friendly approach to weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning. Whether your goal is to lose weight, improve your health, or simply live more frugally while prioritizing your well-being, this app equips you with the tools, personalized guidance, and progress monitoring you need. Start your budget weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning transformation today with the Roman app!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more ‚Ä¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers ‚Äî perfect for designers and creatives Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information ‚Ä¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: ¬µBrowser: Watch Web Browser
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

¬µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch. ¬µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around. Features: - Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard) - Search the web with DuckDuckGo - See your last visited pages - Save pages from the history to your favorites - iOS companion app to manage bookmarks - Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face Please note: ¬µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size. Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers TD
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • Sha'traÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]
  • GrawlÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]
  • KahzÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]
  • AshbiteÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]
  • KutsaoÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • SaitamÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • BonehartÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Captain BlackthorneÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Sha'traÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • NivusÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • GrawlÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • KahzÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • KarkinosÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • AshbiteÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • KutsaoÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: MONOPOLY
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Speed Die & New York ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

  • Orient ExpressÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

  • Champions Token BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Victorian London BoardÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Euro TripÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions ‚Äì no ads, no fuss! Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY 1. Download the official MONOPOLY app 2. Press ‚ÄúPLAY‚Äù 3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token 4. Roll the dice and move around the board 5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it 6. Collect rent when other players land on it 7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed ‚Äì will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 8. If you run out of money, you‚Äôll be bankrupt and out of the game 9. The last player left with a profit wins! FEATURES - MONOPOLY ON THE GO ‚Äì No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! - MULTIPLE MODES ‚Äì Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! - EXCLUSIVE BOARDS ‚Äì Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! - AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE ‚Äì Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game. Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!
